message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of significant value to you.  While I can't disclose the specifics of the product yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm offering it to you for a price of $1000000, but I'm willing to negotiate. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss it further. If not, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $800000.
